review: When it works, it's great. On at least a daily basis, I have to reset the device to establish a wifi connection. I have tried multiple networks, two different routers with no luck. When I called customer service they told me that they are aware of the internet connection dropping issue and that they will let me know when it is resolved. Still haven't heard back (2 months later).
author: Daniel

review: I bought one of their refurbs, since that's the only one they have, at full price. It completely died after 1/2 day of use.
author: KLS

review: FireTV is great, no complaints here but the remote decided to go on strike and stopped working out of the blue after only three months. Maybe it was protesting the working environment? Of course that would happen after the warranty period, that clever little remote! Luckily we downloaded the Amazon Fire TV app onto our tablet and using that. It's really not the best solution but the only one for now.
author: jupiter

review: Many apps not directly linked to amazon run poorly.  When searching for media will mainly show what you can purchase from amazon even if free on netflix, hulu ect.. Buy a roku wish I had bought another instead of this brick
author: ron vander heide

review: I only have the fire stick and I love it. I don't have a schedule that lets me watch regular tv hrs, so I dont have cable tv, its a waste of money. I now watch what I like whenever I want to! Thinking of getting the five tv box.
author: Haydee

review: For the first 3 weeks I loved it. It worked perfect. I like the interface and speed. Now whenever I turn it back on I have to unplug it then plug it back in to come on. Sometimes the sound will go off in the middle of a show and you pause or rewind and it comes back on. It freezes occasionally also. I've had a Roku 2 in the bedroom for a couple years and it still works great. I've talked to a couple of friends and they have the exact same issues. I think Amazon needs to work the bugs out of this product.
author: ForeSee

review: I purchased this when they were having the $50 discount for signing up with Sling for 3 months. I jumped on this deal so I could try installing Kodi on it since I was tired of my raspberry pi lagging. It was very easy to install and this thing is super fast. I originally had my raspberry hard wired, but with the Fire TV I can now stream movies to it with no buffering or lag issues!!! I am also a prime member so all the free prime videos are nice as well! I am very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend if you need a media player. Small, compact, and beats having a pc tower next to your TV. Get one!!!!!
author: Allen
